alert.note: Alert for Cooke; Montague (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 02 at 4:35PM CDT until April 02 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Montague County in north central Texas... Northwestern Cooke County in north central Texas... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 435 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Nocona, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Nocona, St. Jo, Lake Nocona, Hubert H Moss Lake, Nocona Hills, Montague, Bulcher, Capps Corner, Illinois Bend, Marysville, Spanish Fort, Stoneburg, Sivells Bend, Belcherville, Bonita and Ringgold. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for north central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
